strings.EC1English: English value is required for Contact - Organization name
strings.EC1French: French value is required for Contact - Organization name
strings.EC1GovEnglish: English value for Contact - Organisation name in Government of Canada should have a title value as defined in the Registry of Applied Titles. See: http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC1GovFrench: French value for Contact - Organisation name in Government of Canada should have a title value as defined in the Registry of Applied Titles. See: http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC2: Value is required for Contact - Individual name
strings.EC3English: English value is required for Contact - Position name
strings.EC3French: French value is required for Contact - Position name
strings.EC4: Value is required for Keyword type
strings.EC5English: English value is required for Title
strings.EC5French: French value is required for Title
strings.EC9English: English value is required for Abstract
strings.EC9French: French value is required for Abstract
strings.EC11: Value is required for Maintenance and update frequency
strings.EC12: Value is required for Topic category
strings.EC13: Value is required for Data classification - Branch
strings.EC14: Value is required for Data classification - Directorate
strings.EC15: Value is required for Data classification - Security classification
strings.EC16English: English value is required for Contact - Electronic mail address
strings.EC16French: French value is required for Contact - Electronic mail address
strings.EC17: Value is required for Contact - Role
strings.EC18: Value is required for Contact - Online resource
strings.EC20: Value is required for Temporal extent
strings.EC21: Value is required for Geographic extent
strings.EC22: Value is required for Spatial representation
strings.EC23: Value is required for Access constraints
strings.EC24: Value is required for Usage constraints
strings.EC25English: English value is required for Keyword
strings.EC25French: French value is required for Keyword
strings.EC26English: English value is required for Distributor Contact - Organization name
strings.EC26French: French value is required for Distributor Contact - Organization name
strings.EC26GovEnglish: English value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC26GovFrench: French value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC27: Value is required for Distributor Contact - Individual name
strings.EC28English: English value is required for Distributor Contact - Position name
strings.EC28French: French value is required for Distributor Contact - Position name
strings.EC29English: English value is required for Distributor Contact - Electronic mail address
strings.EC29French: French value is required for Distributor Contact - Electronic mail address
strings.EC30: Value is required for Distributor Contact - Role
strings.EC31: Value is required for Distributor Contact - Online resource
strings.EC32English: English value is required for Use Limitation
strings.EC32French: French value is required for Use Limitation
strings.EC33: Value is required for Reference System - Code
strings.EC34: Value is required for Reference System - Codespace
strings.EC35English: English value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Electronic mail address
strings.EC35French: French value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Electronic mail address
strings.EC36: Value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Role
strings.EC37English: English value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name
strings.EC37French: French value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name
strings.EC37GovEnglish: English value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC37GovFrench: French value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC38: Value is required for distribution format - File name
strings.EC39: Value is required for distribution format - File version
strings.EC40: Value is required for Metadata publication date
strings.EC41: Value is required for Metadata creation date
strings.SupplementalInformation: English and French values are required for Supplemental Information
strings.SupplementalInformation_1: English value is required for Supplemental Information
strings.SupplementalInformation_2: French value is required for Supplemental Information
strings.Project: English and French values are required for Project
strings.Project_1: English value is required for Project
strings.Project_2: French value is required for Project
strings.PositionName_1: English value is required for Contact - Position Name
strings.PositionName_2: French value is required for Contact - Position Name
strings.PositionNameCited_1: English value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Position Name
strings.PositionNameCited_2: French value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Position Name
strings.PositionNameDist_1: English value is required for Distributor Contact - Position Name
strings.PositionNameDist_2: French value is required for Distributor Contact - Position Name
strings.HoursOfService: English and French values are required for Contact - Hours of Service
strings.HoursOfService_1: English value is required for Contact - Hours of Service
strings.HoursOfService_2: French value is required for Contact - Hours of Service
strings.HoursOfServiceCited_1: English value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Hours of Service
strings.HoursOfServiceCited_2: French value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Hours of Service
strings.HoursOfServiceDist_1: English value is required for Distributor Contact - Hours of Service
strings.HoursOfServiceDist_2: French value is required for Distributor Contact - Hours of Service
strings.Linkage: Value is required for Online Resource - URL
strings.Linkage_1: English value is required for Online Resource - URL
strings.Linkage_2: French value is required for Online Resource - URL
strings.Name: English and French values are required for Online Resource - Name
strings.Name_1: English value is required for Online Resource - Name
strings.Name_2: French value is required for Online Resource - Name
strings.Description: English and French values are required for Online Resource - Description
strings.Description_1: English value is required for Online Resource - Description
strings.Description_2: French value is required for Online Resource - Description
strings.Note_1: English value is required for Other Constraints
strings.Note_2: French value is required for Other Constraints
strings.DeliveryPoint_1: English value is required for Contact - Delivery Point
strings.DeliveryPoint_2: French value is required for Contact - Delivery Point
strings.DeliveryPointCited_1: English value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Delivery Point
strings.DeliveryPointCited_2: French value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Delivery Point
strings.DeliveryPointDist_1: English value is required for Distributor Contact - Delivery Point
strings.DeliveryPointDist_2: French value is required for Distributor Contact - Delivery Point
strings.Phone_1: English value is required for Contact - Phone
strings.Phone_2: French value is required for Contact - Phone
strings.PhoneCited_1: English value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Phone
strings.PhoneCited_2: French value is required for Cited Responsible Contact - Phone
strings.PhoneDist_1: English value is required for Distributor Contact - Phone
strings.PhoneDist_2: French value is required for Distributor Contact - Phone
strings.MapResourcesREST: REST Map Resources should be available in english and french
strings.MapResourcesRESTNumber: The number of ESRI REST Map Resources should be at most 2 (one for english and one for french)
strings.MapResourcesWMS: WMS Map Resources should be available in english and french
strings.MapResourcesWMSNumber: The number of WMS Map Resources should be at most 2 (one for english and one for french)
strings.ResourceDescription: Online resource description is not valid. The format should be: ContentType;Format;Lang
strings.ResourceDescriptionContentType: Online resource description content type is not valid. Valid values are: Web Service,Service Web,Dataset,Données,API,Application,Supporting Document,Document de soutien
strings.ResourceDescriptionFormat: Online resource description format is not valid. Valid values are:
strings.ResourceDescriptionLanguage: Online resource description language is not valid. Should be a comma separated values of ISO-LANG-3 codes
strings.OpenLicense: The Open Government Licence is required. English value : Open Government Licence - Canada (http://open.canada.ca/en/open-government-licence-canada) , French value : Licence du gouvernement ouvert - Canada (http://ouvert.canada.ca/fr/licence-du-gouvernement-ouvert-canada)
strings.EndPosition: End position date should be after begin position
strings.BeginPositionFormat: Begin position format is not valid value
strings.EndPositionFormat: End position format is not valid value
strings.ECCountry: Country should have a value as defined in the ISO 3166 code list. See https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search/code/
strings.ECThesaurusOrg: Thesaurus cited responsible party organisation is required
strings.ECThesaurusRole: Thesaurus cited responsible party role is required
strings.ECThesaurusEmail: Thesaurus cited responsible party email is required
strings.ReferenceSystemInfo: Value is required for Reference System
strings.MetadataStandardName: Value is not valid for Metadata Standard Name, should be 'North American Profile of ISO 19115:2003 - Geographic information - Metadata' in english and 'Profil nord-américain de la norme ISO 19115:2003 - Information géographique - Métadonnées' in french
strings.SpatialRepresentation: Value is required for Spatial representation
strings.InvalidAccessConstraints: Access constraints code is not valid
strings.InvalidUseConstraints: Use constraints code is not valid
strings.CoreSubjectThesaurusMissing: Core Subject Thesaurus keywords are mandatory
strings.InformationClassification: Value is required for Information Category
strings.SecurityClassification: Value is required for Security Classification
strings.DistributionFormatInvalid: Value for distribution format is not valid
